T02D2048:151b-1: lha'i gnas su stong phrag brgyad bzlas pas /
T02D2048:151b-2: de nas mtshan phyed na rkang gdub kyi sgra dang
T02D2048:151b-3: bcas pas 'ong ste lha'i 'dod yon thams cad ster
T02D2048:151b-4: ba dang / de dang bcas pa'i lo stong 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2048:151b-5: de gzhan gyi rjes su 'brangs nas kyang aa pa tsha ra bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2048:151b-6: lag pa gnyis padma'i phyag rgya bca' ba ni /
T02D2048:151b-7: aa pa tsha ri'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
